overview:
Varun joins Roebling Partners from the Global Infrastructure & Privatization Group within the Investment Banking Division at UBS India. After graduating with degrees in Accountancy & Finance and Taxation, Varun completed a one year specialist post-graduate program focused on securities laws. He also holds the CAIA (Chartered Alternative Investment Analyst) and FRM (Financial Risk Manager) charters.

Varun provides analytical support to the Roebling Partners team and brings advanced knowledge of accounting, financial modeling, and industry research. Before UBS, he worked as an integral member of half a dozen startup enterprises where he learned the specifics of capital structures, corporate legal practices, and startup strategy.
